set(THIS_PROJECT bigdigits)

project( ${THIS_PROJECT} )

#START-FILE-LIST
# File List auto generated by waf2cmake.py, do not modify manually.

set (SourceGroup_Root
	../../SDKs/BigDigits/bigd.c
	../../SDKs/BigDigits/bigd.h
	../../SDKs/BigDigits/bigdRand.c
	../../SDKs/BigDigits/bigdRand.h
	../../SDKs/BigDigits/bigdigits.c
	../../SDKs/BigDigits/bigdigits.h
	../../SDKs/BigDigits/spBigdigits.c
	../../SDKs/BigDigits/spRandom.c
	../../SDKs/BigDigits/spRandom.h
)


# Support unity build with uber files
set(NoUberFile ${SourceGroup_Root}  )


set (SOURCES
	${NoUberFile}
)
#END-FILE-LIST

add_library( ${THIS_PROJECT} STATIC ${SOURCES})

SET_PLATFORM_TARGET_PROPERTIES( ${THIS_PROJECT} )
